data.text:
Chair of the Board of Trustees

Richard B. Handler â83 is chair of the Universityâs Board of Trustees and CEO of Jefferies Financial Group. He earned his bachelorâs degree in economics magna cum laude with high distinction from the University in 1983 and his MBA from Stanford University in 1987. Handler was elected to the University of Rochester Board of Trustees in 2005 and was appointed chair of the Board in 2018.
